text: 4:10 2 Samuel 1:1-16Dughiar kɨ Siklakɨn nguibamɨn itimɨn, gumazir mam iza na batogha ghaze, Sol aremegha gɨfa. A ghaze, kɨ ti an akam gakuegham. Ezɨ puvatɨ. Kɨ mɨdorozir gumazibav kemezɨ me an suiragha, a mɨsoghezɨma an areme. Kar mati, akar kurar a na bagha inigha izezimɨn ivezir kuram kɨ a ganɨngi.
